pageDescription: The soundtrack I created for The Patience Test!

music.title: Blue Hill Corporation
music.description: The jingle for the fictional Blue Hill Corporation, the fictional in-game organisation.

music.title: Tutorial
music.description: The music used in the instructional video shown to you at the beginning of the game.

music.title: Music Box Memories
music.description: A song used in an easter egg, originally from a game I made back in 2015.

music.title: Wind-Swept Fields
music.description: A song used in an easter egg, a peaceful guitar melody.

music.title: Disco Gun Fever
music.description: A song used in an easter egg, originally from Cellborn for the Music Gun.

music.title: Black Hat Hacker
music.description: A song used in an easter egg, originally from the VortexOS OST.
